name: 王玉瑞
objective: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
schedule:
Week 1～２, Solid solutions
Week ３, Phases
Week ４～５, Binary phase Diagrams
Week ６～７, Diffusion in substitutional solid solutions
Week ８, Interstitial diffusion
Week 9, Midterm Exam
Week 10~12, Solidification of Metal
Week 13~14, Nucleation and Growth Kinetics
Week 15, Precipitation Hardening
Week 16~17 Deformation Twinning and Martensite Reactions
Week 18, Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. 期中期末考各占４０％
2. 出席率上課態度作業２０％
materials: Physical Metallurgy Principles, 3rd Ed., Robert E. Reed-Hill, Reza Abbaschian

name: 殳國俊
objective:
本學期課程集中在物理冶金與擴散有關之章節, 包括擴散, 凝固, 析出與退火，幫助學生建立材料科學之基礎知識。此課程為以課堂授課為主，並將另外安排教學助理時間，針對作業進行討論。 

This course focus on the discussion of the diffusion in physical metallurgy. Including diffusion, solidification, precipitation, and annealing. The objective of this course is to establish the basic knowledge of materials science for the students and to further connect the knowledge to related future researches. This course is a lecture-oriented course. Teaching assistant’s time will be arranged for the discussion of homework.
schedule:
W1-5 擴散 (diffusion)
W6-10 凝固 (solidification)
W11-15 析出硬化 (precipitation hardening)
W16-20 退火 (annealing)
materials: Physical Metallurgy Principles, Fourth Edition, Robert E. Reed-Hill
